org.gwtbootstrap3.client.ui

Class Tooltip

  • Object
    • AbstractTooltip
      • Tooltip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AcceptsOneWidget, HasOneWidget, HasWidgets, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>, HasHover, HasId
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TooltipHelpBlock

    public class Tooltip
extends AbstractTooltip
    Basic implementation for the Bootstrap tooltip

    Bootstrap Documentation

    UiBinder example

     <b:Tooltip text="...">
    ...
 </b:Tooltip>

    Author:
    Steven Jardine

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface HasWidgets

        HasWidgets.ForIsWidget

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tooltip()
      Creates the empty Popover
      Tooltip(String title)
      Creates the tooltip with given title.
      Tooltip(Widget w)
      Creates the tooltip around this widget
      Tooltip(Widget w, String title)
      Creates the tooltip around this widget with given title and content.

      • updateTitleWhenShowing

        protected void updateTitleWhenShowing()
        Update the title. This should only be called when the title is already showing. It causes a small flicker but updates the title immediately.
        Specified by:
        updateTitleWhenShowing in class AbstractTooltip
